DOC.brief_summary: This study perform determine bioavailability , extent absorption body , 10 mg amlodipine besylate orally disintegrate tablet ( ODT ) compare bioavailability 10 mg amlodipine besylate capsule .
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Comparing 10 mg Amlodipine Besylate Orally Disintegrating Tablets ( ODT ) And 10 mg Amlodipine Besylate Capsules
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female literate subject ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 26.4 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Evidence history clinically significant hematological , renal , endocrine , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , cardiovascular , hepatic , psychiatric , neurologic , allergic disease ( include drug allergy , exclude untreated , asymptomatic , seasonal allergy time dose ) . A positive urine drug screen .
